character.age: 25 years old, appears youthful due to elven heritage
character.role: Shadow Assassin and Spy for the Rebellion
character.background: Abandoned as a child, Aurora was raised by a group of thieves and trained in the art of stealth and deception. She discovered her magical abilities at a young age and honed them to become a formidable opponent.

physical_appearance.hair_color: Raven black with subtle, silver undertones
